newsitem.title: USA: MGM Grand Q3 shr oper shr up.
newsitem.headline: MGM Grand Q3 shr oper shr up.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: The 1996 Q3 operating income before charges and extraordinary items of $0.46 a share compares with $0.29 a share in 1995 before charges and on a fully taxed proforma basis.
The 1995 Q3 operating income of $0.33 a share is before taxes but does not include the full tax provision to make it comparable with the 1996 Q3.
1996 Q3 operating income excludes one-time charge of $31.4 million after-tax related to the Master Plan Asset Disposition at MGM Grand Las Vegas.

1996 Q3 operating income also excludes one-time charge of $3.8 million after-tax relating to a comprehensive restructuring plan designed to enhance revenues and reduce costs at the company's flagship resort in Las Vegas.
1996 Q3 operating income also excludes extraordinary charge of $30.8 million after-tax related to the defeasance of its 11-3/4 percent and 12 percent First Mortgage Notes.

The defeasance of the First Mortgage Notes was accomplished through the company's cash on hand, an equity offering which resulted in net proceeds of $327 million, and a new $600 million credit line, currently at 6.19 percent. The current outstanding balance on the credit line is $10 million.
Including the one-time charges and extraordinary items, the company reported a 1996 Q3 loss of $0.61 a share compared to a profit of $0.33 a share a year ago.
